title: What are the lyrics to 'Put Your Hearts Up' by Ariana Grande? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is one of my favorite song by her.♥ Lemme see you put your hearts up, yeah lemme see you put your hearts up, yeah If we give a little love, maybe we can change the world You think you're so small Like you're itty bitty. Just one match in the lights of the city Walking by strangers on the side of the street Like a quarter in a cup'll get 'em off on their feet, like You think you're never gonna make your mark Sit back
